prompt: Write a cover letter based on below resume and the job posting: Resume : Zhexu ( Steven ) Zhang Github : https://github.com/StevenZhangzhexu Contact number : +65 SUMMARY A data scientist enthusiast with about 2 years of experience in business intelligence , data analytics and project management in finance sectors . A self - motivated and geeky individual whose desire to learn is endless . SELECTED PROJECTS Utilized time series analysis in python with Vector ARIMA , SARIMA & GARCH models to predict dengue cases in Singapore . Leveraged time series analysis in R to predict FOREX trend and S&P stock price trend and then used it as an indicator for algorithmic trading strategy . Subreddit classification model in python applying ensemble methods ( XGBoosting and Stacking ) over Random Forest and Logistic Regression based on Web scrapped data via API and transformed by Tfidf Vectorizer ( NLP ) . House price prediction linear regression model based on Kaggle dataset ( pipeline , regularization and hyper - parameters tuning with randomized search ) EXPERIENCE DBS Singapore Business Analyst ( Sep 2021 – 2023/02/02 ) Conducting UAT testing via SQL queries for multiple projects and using JIRA to log issue tickets and then collaborate with tech to resolve issues . Contributing robust SQL code for risk mart tables reference integrity checks and improve 60% efficiency . Ad - hoc data analytics like Impact analysis or amount reconciliation for system migration projects using python ( pandas ) , SQL and Excel pivot table and functions . Updating configuration for products like risk product code according to project scope and requirements . Maybank Singapore Business Analyst ( Sep 2019 – Aug 2021 ) Liaised with business users to fathom definition and formula of data fields to author user requirements documents and develop the Functional Specifications of program changes to handover to IT department . Leveraged SAS and SQL to implement data mapping , data modeling and UAT Testing . Created Power BI dashboard to reflect project status and KPI . Scripted in Power BI DAX to transform and cleanse operational raw data and to reduce data discrepancy . PSA Singapore Data Analyst Intern ( May 2019 – Aug 2019 ) Scripted in QlikView to realize data cleaning , data mapping and data transformation . Prepared the configuration for the ingestion ETL framework to extract , load and manipulate high - volume data from various data sources into QlikView . EDUCATION National University of Singapore Singapore B.Sc . in Applied Mathematics ( Aug 2016 – Aug 2019 ) General Assembly Data Science Bootcamp ( Aug 2022 – Mar 2023 , part - time ) Singapore CERTIFICATE Deep Learning Specialization Coursera Course Certificates ( Neural Networks , CNN , RNN , CV , NLP ) SKILLS & INTERESTS Familiar with statistics and Machine Learning concepts . Proficient in Python and SQL ; Intermediate level in R , HTML , CSS , JavaScript , shell(zsh ) Passion in applying Machine Learning to financial area . ( like algorithmic trading ) Bilingual in English and Mandarin .             Job Posting: About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations , flights , and more . We build and deploy cutting - edge technology that connects travelers with more than million accommodations globally . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings , our 6,000 + employees representing + nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity , creativity , and collaboration . We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership ,   enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world . Get to know our team : Partner Development is a team of creative entrepreneurs that develop solutions for Agoda ’s accommodation partners and promote Agoda ’s top and bottom line growth . We design tailored business and product solutions with our partners and help them generate measurable value . Members of our team are empowered and supported to grow their market(s ) or accounts . We develop win - win relationships and leverage Agoda ’s unique accommodations portfolio and tech solutions to bring our partners the advantages they seek . Utilizing our strong brand and resources , we roll out new product to increase the visibility of Agoda , introduce more travelers to our great products and service and deliver significant revenues to the overall business . In this role you ’ll get to This role is designed to mainly growth opportunity identification among mid to long tail hotels , experiment execution and data tracking within Partner Development team for the global teams . You will get to work directly with the regional team to design and put in place global experimentation and initiatives to drive tangible impact in each market . Key activities involved include but not limit to : Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis , data mining , and the presentation of data to identify opportunities for business improvements and support your recommendations Own end - to - end project or roll out new experiments to validate in - market impact of an initiative within Partner Development Build dashboards , identify new and track key metrics to closely monitor team ’s performance and identify quick and long term opportunities for improvements Work closely with cross - functional teams of analysts , regional team leads , product managers and business owners to drive changes based on opportunities identified Support global Partner Development related initiatives , including experimentation infrastructure - building and methodology standardization What You ’ll Need To Succeed Bachelor ’s degree in science , computer science , statistics , economics , mathematics , or similar quantitative discipline 4 - 8 years experience working in a business analysis , data analysis , reporting or business strategy role Excellent problem - solving skills including the ability to analyze and resolve complex problems using data Team player with strong interpersonal , relationship - building , and stakeholder management skills Coding skills for analytics and data manipulation ( SQL , R , Python , Pandas , Scala ) Data visualization tool experience such as with Tableau or your weapon of choice Ability to work under pressure in a fast - paced and rapidly changing environment Excellent communication skills ( both verbal and written in English ) , with proven ability to convey complex messages clearly and with conviction  ->
completion:
Dear [Hiring Manager's Name],

I am writing in response to the [Position Name] role at Agoda. As a data scientist enthusiast with 2 years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, and project management in finance sectors, I am confident that my skills and experience make me a strong fit for this position.

In my current role as a Business Analyst at DBS Singapore, I have honed my skills in conducting UAT testing via SQL queries and contributing robust SQL code for reference integrity checks. I am also experienced in ad-hoc data analytics and improving efficiency through the use of python and SQL. I am excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and knowledge to the role at Agoda.

The opportunity to work on end-to-end projects, design experiments, and track metrics at Agoda appeals to me greatly. I am familiar with the use of quantitative analysis, data mining, and data presentation to identify business improvement opportunities. I have over 3 years experience using SQL, 1 year experience using R, Python, Pandas, and Tableau, and I am confident in my ability to manipulate and visualize data to support my recommendations.

I hold a Bachelor's degree in Applied Mathematics from National University of Singapore, and I have completed a Data Science Bootcamp from General Assembly as well as the Deep Learning Specialization course from Coursera. I am passionate about applying machine learning to financial areas, and I am excited about the prospect of working on global experimentation and initiatives in the finance sector at Agoda.

I am a team player with strong interpersonal, relationship-building, and stakeholder management skills. I have excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced and rapidly changing environment.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to further discuss my qualifications and how I can contribute to the success of Agoda.

Sincerely,
Zhexu (Steven) Zhang

( like algorithmic trading ) Bilingual in English and Mandarin .         Kelly ® Professional & Industrial * , we ’re passionate about helping you find a job that works for you . How about this one ? We ’re seeking an HR Assistant/ Office Administrator * to work in * Lawrence , KS * . With us , it ’s all about finding the job that ’s just right . Why should you apply ? * Monday - Friday Flexible Hours , or 9am- pm $ 50k / yr Job Description :* This position is responsible for a variety of HR administrative duties and general management support . Major Responsibilities / Accountabilities :* Responsible for timely and accurate processing of bi - weekly payroll for Hourly and Non - exempt workforce . Process job and/or compensation changes in applicable systems . Support the recruiting , hiring and on - boarding process of new employees . Gather , compile , and verify information and enter the data into appropriate systems ( Excel and Access ) for reporting requirements . Manage and process weekly attendance reports using a database . Secure , maintain up to date and ensure confidentiality of all relevant information in employee ’s personnel and medical files . Provide support in the application of administrative processes for the appropriate execution of the Union contract and company ’s HR policies . Provide administrative support to the site management team as needed . Administer the plant drug testing policy from purchase requisition to coordination of on - site testing . Provide support and help coordinate employee activities , such as arranging on and off - site company events and training sessions . General office duties as assigned . Required Skills and Experience :* At least - years ’ experience in an office environment . Proficient using Microsoft Office ( Excel , Word , Access , Power - Point , Outlook ) . Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail . Good written and oral communication skills . Good grammar , editing and writing skills . Ability to handle multiple priorities simultaneously . What will set you apart :* Experience with payroll software ( ADP preferred ) . Experience working in industrial office setting . Experience with ERPs ( SAP preferred ) . Experience with a HRIS ( SuccessFactors preferred ) . Advanced skills in Excel & PowerPoint .->
completion:
Dear [Hiring Manager’s Name],

I am writing in response to your recent job posting for an HR Assistant/Office Administrator position in Lawrence, KS. As a data scientist enthusiast with over 2 years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, and project management in finance sectors, I am confident that my skills and experience make me a strong candidate for this role.

My recent experience as a Business Analyst at DBS Singapore, where I conducted UAT testing via SQL queries and contributed robust SQL code for risk mart tables reference integrity checks, demonstrates my ability to manage and analyze data effectively.My previous experience in liaising with stakeholders and managing their expectations has also honed my interpersonal and communication skills. Additionally, my experience with Microsoft Office and my proficiency in Excel and Access, as well as my excellent organizational skills and attention to detail, make me confident in my ability to handle the day-to-day responsibilities of this position.

I am also passionate about finding a job that is the right fit for me, and I believe that this position is exactly that. I am excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and experience to support the HR administrative duties and general management support of your organization.

I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss my qualifications and enthusiasm for this role further. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

Job Posting: We are looking for a Data Analyst preferably with an Asset Management background on a 2 - year contract basis . This is a good opportunity to work with one of the leading financial services players in their digital transformation journey . You will be a part of the Data and AI team and will be responsible for the delivery of the data projects end to end . Skills , Experience & Responsibilities : Good working experience in Data Analysis and Business Intelligence . Good working experience in Data & AI projects . completion:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Data Analyst role that is currently available within your organization. With 2 years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, and project management in the finance sector, I am confident that my skills and expertise make me a strong candidate for the role.

My background in data science, along with my experience in utilizing time series analysis and implementing data mapping, modeling, and UAT testing, has equipped me with the necessary skills to excel in this position. My previous experience in liaising with stakeholders and managing their expectations has also honed my interpersonal and communication skills.

I am particularly interested in this opportunity as it offers the chance to be part of a leading financial services player's digital transformation journey and work with the Data and AI team. My passion for applying machine learning in the financial area, combined with my proficiency in Python, SQL, and PowerBI, make me a strong match for the required skills and experience.

Please find attached my resume for your review. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss my application further and answer any questions you may have.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Sincerely,

Zhexu (Steven) Zhang
